    • Constructor Detail

      • Hotel

        public Hotel(java.lang.String hotelName)
        Constructor for a hotel. Initialises three lists for each room type and one list for all of the hotels bookings.
        Parameters:
        hotelName - The name of the hotel to construct.

    • Method Detail

      • addRoom

        public void addRoom(java.lang.String roomName,
           int roomType)
        Adds the given room to the appropriate room list.
        Parameters:
        roomName - The name of room to add.
        roomType - The type of room to add.

      • addBooking

        public void addBooking(java.lang.String bookingLine)
        Adds the given booking to this hotel. It is assumed that this the hotel can accommodate the booking.
        Parameters:
        bookingLine - String detailing the booking.

      • canBook

        public boolean canBook(java.lang.String bookingLine,
              java.util.ArrayList<Booking> bookingsToUse)
        Given a booking and a list of bookings, determines in the booking is valid.
        Parameters:
        bookingLine - parameters for the booking
        Returns:
        true if booking is available, false otherwise

      • cancelBooking

        public boolean cancelBooking(java.lang.String cancellationDetails,
                    java.lang.String user)
        Checks that the specified booking exists under the user's name and if so, removes bookings from the list.
        Parameters:
        cancellationDetails - Details on which reservations to cancel.
        user - The user requesting the cancellation.
        Returns:
        True if cancellation went through, false otherwise.

      • canChange

        public int canChange(java.lang.String changeDetails,
            java.lang.String user)
        Checks if the requested change is valid.
        Parameters:
        changeDetails - String detailing the requested change.
        user - Name of the user requesting the change
        Returns:
        0 if invalid cancellation(and thus, invalid booking), 1 if valid cancellation but invalid booking for this hotel, 2 if valid cancellation and valid booking for this hotel.

      • formatBookings

        public java.util.ArrayList<java.lang.String> formatBookings()
        Converts each booking instance into a string for printing
        Returns:
        A list of booking strings in printable format

      • printBookings

        public void printBookings(java.util.ArrayList<java.lang.String> unorderedBookings)
        Sorts a list of booking strings in alphabetical order and outputs it into System.out.
        Parameters:
        unorderedBookings - List of unordered bookings strings

      • getHotelName

        public java.lang.String getHotelName()
        Gets hotel's name.
        Returns:
        String containing this hotel's name

      • getBookings

        public java.util.ArrayList<Booking> getBookings()
        Gets all the bookings for this hotel in the order that they were booked.
        Returns:
        List containing bookings for this hotel in order they were booked.
